title: Bowen: Why Ukraine remains defiant and does not feel close to defeat
summary_full: This month marks four gruelling years since the full‑scale invasion began and a genuine ceasefire still feels far from assured
summary_public: This month marks four gruelling years since the full‑scale invasion began and a genuine ceasefire still feels far from assured

UA.label: positive
